name: Experiment box
description:
"Experiment box" is a skill based puzzle solver

This game is submitted for the the "Boundless Game jam" and made within 7 days. It's a skill based puzzle solver in which you are limited to use every action only once. Find the right order and angles to complete each level. Discover new abilities to help you reach the goal. 

Each level can be solved in various ways and will require timing and skill to complete.

How to play:

Arrow keys to choose direction

Space to use Action

R to restart

You can choose to replay previous levels at the top right of the game.
